monitoring can – in addition to the Directive´s provisions – cover the Code’s provisions too.
20  Maternity leave can exist and coexist in the following three forms: fully paid, partially paid and voluntary (unpaid). The same applies to 
paternity leave. Paid maternity leave is funded by social insurance or public funds and is a well-recognized core requiremen
